Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: Run of the Arrow
programme.desc: A postwar Confederate passes a challenging Dakota ritual, takes a bride and then joins attacks on the cavalry.

programme.title: Three Hours to Kill
programme.desc: The inhabitants of a small western community turn on Jim Guthrie (Dana Andrews) when he becomes the prime suspect for a murder he didn't commit. Before getting a chance to prove his innocence, Jim is driven from his home and into the wilderness, where he is left for dead. Despite the danger, he comes back years later, discovering that he's still a wanted man. But a kindhearted local named Chris (Dianne Foster) believes his story, and together they begin a desperate search for the true culprit.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Murder
programme.desc: A Michigan lawyer (James Stewart) and his colleague defend an Army lieutenant (Ben Gazzara) who killed the man who raped the officer's wife (Lee Remick).

programme.title: Thunder Bay
programme.desc: Wildcatters (James Stewart, Dan Duryea) put their offshore oil rig where Louisiana fishermen get their shrimp.

programme.title: Marooned
programme.desc: Oscar-winning special effects highlight this story about efforts to rescue three astronauts stranded in space.

programme.title: Hellgate
programme.desc: After the Civil War, ranch owner Gil Hanley helps a stranger in desperate need of medical attention. Soon he is questioned by Union soldiers about the stranger, who turns out to be an ex-Confederate soldier.

programme.title: Pecos River
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) and his singing sidekick (Smiley Burnette) catch mail robbers.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick was an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible. His simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: A much-maligned mule plays a pivotal role in a newspaperman's efforts to ruin Wyatt's reputation.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: A bloodstain provides Holmes with a clue in the theft of a vital government document.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Murder
programme.desc: A Michigan lawyer (James Stewart) and his colleague defend an Army lieutenant (Ben Gazzara) who killed the man who raped the officer's wife (Lee Remick).

programme.title: Thunder Bay
programme.desc: Wildcatters (James Stewart, Dan Duryea) put their offshore oil rig where Louisiana fishermen get their shrimp.

programme.title: Pecos River
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) and his singing sidekick (Smiley Burnette) catch mail robbers.

programme.title: Three Hours to Kill
programme.desc: The inhabitants of a small western community turn on Jim Guthrie (Dana Andrews) when he becomes the prime suspect for a murder he didn't commit.

programme.title: Along Came Jones
programme.desc: A cowboy (Gary Cooper) with a sidekick (William Demarest) is taken for an outlaw and saved by a woman sharpshooter (Loretta Young).

programme.title: The Man Inside
programme.desc: A private eye (Jack Palance) and others search New York and Europe for a famous diamond and its thief (Nigel Patrick).

programme.title: Drums Along the Mohawk
programme.desc: The year is 1776, and newlyweds Gilbert (Henry Fonda) and Lana Martin (Claudette Colbert) have decided to take up a rural lifestyle. However, following the onset of the American Revolutionary War, the couple's quiet life in the Mohawk Valley is interrupted by violent attacks from Native Americans and Tories. The Martins refuse to succumb to the difficulties of their new life, though, as Lana takes on the responsibility of raising a child while Gilbert joins the colonists' militia.

programme.title: The Mouse on the Moon
programme.desc: When the tiny nation of Grand Fenwick suffers a plumbing malfunction, Prime Minister Rupert Mountjoy (Ron Moody) decides to use the competitive nature of the space race to his advantage. He requests financial aid for space research from the United States, and then uses the capital to heat Grand Fenwick's collective bathwater. Meanwhile, the nation's lone scientist, Professor Kokintz (David Kossoff), toils to prepare a fake rocket for launch, fueled by the country's most famous export: wine.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: A scientist (James Caan) replaces a military officer (Robert Duvall) as an astronaut on a space-race moonshot.

programme.title: One A.M.
programme.desc: A drunken homeowner finds it hard to move around his house.

programme.title: Along Came Jones
programme.desc: Melody Jones (Gary Cooper) is a laid-back cowboy who gets lost on the trail and ends up in the small town of Payneville. Seeing the initials "MJ" on his saddle, the people of Payneville mistake Jones for the treacherous bandit Monte Jarrad (Dan Duryea), and they nearly kill him before he is rescued by Cherry de Longpre (Loretta Young). Grateful for her help, Jones falls for de Cherry, not knowing that she is Jarrad's girl and that she plans on using him to help Jarrad elude capture.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick was an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible. His simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Old Man Clanton's idea of a perfect son-in-law is Wyatt.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Holmes connects a school chum's family ritual with a butler's disappearance.

programme.title: The Man Inside
programme.desc: Timid Sam (Nigel Patrick) crunches numbers for a jewelry dealer, but secretly daydreams about nabbing a priceless gem from his employer. After some careful planning, Sam works up the courage to do the heist, but in the process impulsively shoots a cop who catches him. He then jets off to Europe, where he lives the high life. Trudie (Anita Ekberg), however, a more seasoned crook, shadows Sam. All the while private investigator March (Jack Palance) quietly keeps tabs on both parties.

programme.title: The Mouse on the Moon
programme.desc: When the tiny nation of Grand Fenwick suffers a plumbing malfunction, Prime Minister Rupert Mountjoy (Ron Moody) decides to use the competitive nature of the space race to his advantage. He requests financial aid for space research from the United States, and then uses the capital to heat Grand Fenwick's collective bathwater. Meanwhile, the nation's lone scientist, Professor Kokintz (David Kossoff), toils to prepare a fake rocket for launch, fueled by the country's most famous export: wine.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: A scientist (James Caan) replaces a military officer (Robert Duvall) as an astronaut on a space-race moonshot.

programme.title: Drums Along the Mohawk
programme.desc: The year is 1776, and newlyweds Gilbert (Henry Fonda) and Lana Martin (Claudette Colbert) have decided to take up a rural lifestyle. However, following the onset of the American Revolutionary War, the couple's quiet life in the Mohawk Valley is interrupted by violent attacks from Native Americans and Tories. The Martins refuse to succumb to the difficulties of their new life, though, as Lana takes on the responsibility of raising a child while Gilbert joins the colonists' militia.

programme.title: Mackenna's Gold
programme.desc: Apaches, townsfolk, a Mexican bandit (Omar Sharif) and the cavalry follow a sheriff (Gregory Peck) to a mythical canyon of gold.

programme.title: Disaster on the Coastliner
programme.desc: A psychotic engineer bent on revenge sets two passenger trains on a collision course with each other.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: When "Bubber" Reeves (Robert Redford) escapes from prison, it upsets the folks in the nearby town of Tarl, Texas. Sheriff Calder (Marlon Brando) wants to capture Reeves alive, which puts him in opposition to many of the townspeople who have resorted to mob justice. Businessman Val Rogers (E.G. Marshall) wants Calder to apprehend Reeves quickly, through any means, since he fears the criminal will come after Val's son, Jake, who is sleeping with Reeves' wife (Jane Fonda).

programme.title: Those Fantastic Flying Fools
programme.desc: Showman P.T. Barnum (Burl Ives) plans with a balloonist (Troy Donahue) and an inventor (Gert Frobe) to send Gen. Tom Thumb in a rocket to the moon.

programme.title: First Men in the Moon
programme.desc: Around the turn of the 20th century, Joseph Cavor (Lionel Jeffries), a brilliant British scientist, creates his own spacecraft and takes a trip to the moon, accompanied by explorers Arnold Bedford (Edward Judd) and Kate Callender (Martha Hyer). After landing, they encounter an insect-like alien race that lives under the moon's surface, which has an air-like atmosphere. After glimpsing the extraterrestrial society, the group must soon escape back to Earth.

programme.title: The Cure
programme.desc: An alcoholic throws a health spa into chaos.

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: La SRU, Unité de réponse stratégique, est une unité d'élite de la police de Toronto, au Canada, spécialisée dans les opérations paramilitaires. Les missions musclées et extrêmes, prises d'otages, désamorçages de bombes, protection de personnalités, sont dont le lot quotidien de ces hommes et ces femmes surentraînés, qui n'hésitent pas à risquer leur vie pour sauver celle des autres. Série déclinée en cinq saisons (la cinquième étant aussi la dernière), "Flashpoint" nous immerge dans le quotidien de policiers d'élite, inspirés de la Toronto's Emergency Task Force.

programme.desc: Chanel Rion leads bold and uncensored discourse on Big Tech, Big Media, and Big Government. From thought leaders to world leaders, join Chanel as she pierces through the scripts, and reads between the lies. Weeknights on OAN.

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: (2005) Violent action-thriller starring Jason Statham as the tough courier Frank Martin, who's hired to guard a government drugs czar's son. But his mission soon lurches towards disaster.

programme.title: Wild Card
programme.desc: (2015) Sin City thriller with Jason Statham. A compulsive gambler who does favours for money just wants out of the Vegas life. Just one big win at the tables should do it...

programme.title: Straightheads
programme.desc: (2007) Thriller starring Gillian Anderson and Danny Dyer. On their way to a party in the country, a couple are brutally attacked by thugs. Months later, they set out for gory vengeance.

programme.title: Crawlspace
programme.desc: (2022) Tense thriller with Henry Thomas. A plumber gets trapped in the crawlspace of a house with a stash of cash that two bad guys want back. And they'll shoot blindly at walls to get it.

programme.title: Ferdinand
programme.desc: (2017) Charming animated bovine road movie from the makers of Ice Age. A huge but gentle bull (voiced by John Cena) tries to get home after being sent away to a bull fighting ranch.

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part III
programme.desc: (1989) Ralph Macchio and Pat Morita return as the pupil with problems and the karate teacher who doesn't like fighting. This time, Daniel is tricked into defending his All Valley title.

programme.title: The Smallest Show On Earth
programme.desc: (1957) Comedy with Bill Travers and Virginia McKenna as a couple who inherit a dilapidated fleapit cinema, along with its equally dilapidated staff: Peter Sellers, Margaret Rutherford.

programme.title: San Demetrio, London
programme.desc: (1943) Fact-based drama about a group of Merchant Navy sailors who brave fire and the ocean to save the San Demetrio oil tanker after it's almost destroyed by a German cruiser.

programme.title: Belle
programme.desc: (2014) Amma Asante's powerful fact-based drama about Britain's first Black aristocrat. Gugu Mbatha-Raw portrays the extraordinary Dido Belle. Featuring Matthew Goode and Tom Wilkinson.

programme.title: Ticket to Paradise
programme.desc: (2022) Romcom with Julia Roberts and George Clooney. A staggeringly beautiful, divorced couple reunite to stop their daughter's wedding in the staggeringly beautiful surroundings of Bali.

programme.title: Little Fockers
programme.desc: (2010) Comedy sequel with Robert De Niro, Ben Stiller and Jessica Alba. Can Greg Focker live up to nightmare dad-in-law Jack's newfound reluctant sort-of respect?

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: (1987) Sci-fi thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger. A US commando unit gets trapped in the jungle by a murderous, seemingly invincible alien hunter. But they ain't got time to bleed.

programme.desc: (1982) John Huston's adaptation of the Broadway musical about a plucky young orphan who longs for a happier future, starring Aileen Quinn, Albert Finney, Carol Burnett and Tim Curry.

programme.title: The Next Karate Kid
programme.desc: (1994) Kicking family action sequel. Hilary Swank takes on the karate kid soubriquet, as the venerable Mr Miyagi helps her to battle her teenage demons.

programme.title: Operation Petticoat
programme.desc: (1959) Second World War comedy. Tony Curtis and Cary Grant play members of the crew of a submarine that's painted bright pink just as the Japanese launch their assault in the Pacific.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the...
programme.desc: ...Fallen: (2009) Raucous sci-fi action sequel with Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox. Can Sam and Mikaela prevent the scourge of the Decepticon robots from destroying the Earth?

programme.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
programme.desc: (2022) Darkly comic sci-fi action thriller with Michelle Yeoh. A laundromat owner's drab existence becomes much more exciting when she must traverse the multiverse to defeat an evil force.

programme.title: White House Down
programme.desc: (2013) All-American action thriller starring Channing Tatum and Jamie Foxx. A Capitol police officer steps up to protect the President when the White House is compromised.

programme.title: Mousehunt
programme.desc: (1997) Raucous comedy. Two brothers go to immense lengths to try to rid their mansion of a mouse. The mouse goes to immense lengths to rid its mansion of the two brothers. Who will win?

programme.title: The Golden Voyage of Sinbad
programme.desc: (1973) Can Sinbad stop a master magician from reaching the Fountain of Destiny on the lost land of Lemuria and being crowned the new leader of Marabia?

programme.title: Pool of London
programme.desc: (1951) Classic Ealing thriller filmed in a documentary style, starring Bonar Colleano as a sailor whose smuggling activities lead to him being suspected of murder and going on the run.

programme.title: Daleks Invasion Earth 2150 A.D.
programme.desc: (1966) A sci-fi classic with Peter Cushing. Dr Who travels to the future only to find the Daleks have conquered the Earth! Can he stop them nuking the planet's core? With Bernard Cribbins.

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: (2009) JJ Abrams's sci-fi adventure reboot, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Zoe Saldana. A vengeful time traveller targets Kirk and Spock on their first mission.

programme.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
programme.desc: (2022) Daisy Edgar-Jones stars in director Olivia Newman's adaptation of Delia Owens' best-selling novel about a feral child who's accused of murder in America's Deep South. Did she do it?

programme.title: Broker
programme.desc: (2022) Hirokazu Kore-eda's darkly-comic road-trip crime drama about two friends who exploit a church scheme to sell unwanted babies to the childless. With Song Kang-ho. In Korean/subs.

programme.title: One for the Road
programme.desc: (2002) Four drunk-drivers, including Hwyel Bennett and Rupert Proctor, find their lives intertwine at the rehab clinic they're ordered to attend. Very strong language.

programme.desc: ...Curse of the Mummy: (2022) Animated family adventure. After Tad accidentally unleashes a curse - doh! - he and his friends must find the Emerald Tablet to save the world.

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: (1997) Animated drama. When the Russian royal family is murdered, the sole surviving child is separated from her grandmother. Years later, conmen try to exploit the reward for her return.

programme.title: The Man from Colorado
programme.desc: (1948) Western. When a sadistic Union colonel (Glenn Ford) becomes a federal judge after the Civil War, his friend (William Holden) takes the deputy job to try and temper his actions.

programme.title: First Men in the Moon
programme.desc: (1964) Sci-fi starring Lionel Jeffries. An eccentric Victorian inventor builds the first spacecraft to land on the moon, which is inhabited by ant-like beings - animated by Ray Harryhausen.

programme.title: Cutthroat Island
programme.desc: (1995) Swashbuckling adventure. Geena Davis and Matthew Modine star as pirates racing to find the missing parts of their treasure map and beat an evil rival (Frank Langella) to the booty.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick
programme.desc: (2022) Danger-zone action as Tom Cruise returns to the cockpit after 36 years. He's Maverick. He still feels the need for speed. And there's a near-impossible mission to fly. With Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Infinite
programme.desc: (2021) Sci-fi action. Mark Wahlberg discovers that his hallucinations are memories from past lives. There are others like him, but they don't all have good intentions...

programme.title: Sweat
programme.desc: (2020) Polish drama. An unusually authentic viral video changes everything for a social media fitness influencer whose confident online persona masks her vulnerability. In Polish/subs.

programme.desc: Paul Tracy sits down with Dutch motorsport legend Arie Luyendyk, a two-time Indianapolis 500 winner whose fearless driving and record-breaking speed earned him the nickname The Flying Dutchman.

programme.title: 2025 Monster Jam - Arena in 30
programme.desc: California's Ashley Sanford leads Megalodon into battle against the stars of Arena Championship Series West.

programme.title: 2025 Inside Monster Jam
programme.desc: Montana and Triton Robbins discuss growing up around "Monster Jam" and their Rookie of the Year aspirations.

programme.title: Racers Unchained
programme.desc: Paul Tracy sits down with Dutch motorsport legend Arie Luyendyk, a two-time Indianapolis 500 winner whose fearless driving and record-breaking speed earned him the nickname The Flying Dutchman.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The team travels to Oregon for the Bend Overland Expo and visits places like Crater Lake National Park; testing the Opus OP15 off-road trailer which sleeps four and has a full outdoor kitchen and solar power to live off-grid.

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: A journey back in time to the very origins of drag racing; remastered archived footage with narration by Professor Jay Deez III bring these historical stories back to life again.

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show
programme.desc: A bi-annual auto festival at Panama City Beach, Fla., is known as the South's Best Blast from the Past.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: The day of the big ride arrives; hundreds of bikes bring excitement to the dealership as the team manages the unexpected crowd; Dan's friends, moonshiners Tim Smith and Josh Owens, join in on the ride through Bootlegger Country.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Other People's Children: Drama series. Martin and Louisa are not having much success with their therapy, so Dr Timoney suggests they go back to the beginning and plan a date. S7 Ep6

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Castles in the Air: Detective drama series. DCI Vera Stanhope investigates the brutal murder of a young physiotherapist gunned down at a luxury country retreat. S3 Ep1

programme.title: Without Sin
programme.desc: Psychological thriller. When we meet Stella Tomlinson, it's been three years since the murder of her teenage daughter Maisy but the wound is as fresh as if it were yesterday. S1 Ep1

programme.title: Without Sin
programme.desc: Psychological thriller series. Stella wrestles with whether to trust Charles or not - and following up on Cleo's disappearance - while also trying to unearth who he really is. S1 Ep2

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: The Inspector's Pets: Classic sitcom. Stan and Jack are coerced into looking after the inspector's pets. S5 Ep4

programme.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Marc and Lady Tara are unimpressed by Pearl's antics as they return for Len's funeral. Donna announces her career plans, while Jo is hurt to learn Andy went behind her back.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Pearl and Edna argue at Len's graveside as the villagers pay their last respects. Daz is thrilled by Billy's return, while Rodney's increasing role in Sharon's wedding angers Val.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Tracy is allowed out of prison long enough to attend Charlie's funeral, where Jason struggles to give a eulogy to his boss. David misreads Maria's behaviour and tries to kiss her.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: David is hurt by Maria's rejection and gets revenge by telling everyone Charlie tried to drown him - before making an outrageous claim. Kelly thinks love is in the air.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A Tale of Two Hamlets: The death of a young film star at a Satanic experience at his family's ancestral pile brings Barnaby and Troy to the feuding hamlets of Upper and Lower Warden. S6 Ep4

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Should I Stay or Should I Go Now: Medical drama. A new student nurse arrives at the Royal, and Lizzie falls for a stunt rider who is convinced that he is destined to die young. S8 Ep5

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Sophie's Choice: Drama series. An ill woman becomes an unwitting criminal and George and Greengrass become rivals in the pigeon-racing game. S5 Ep7

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Gone Tomorrow: Drama series. Against the backdrop of a huge electrical storm, Nick has to mediate in a neighbourhood feud, while Greengrass wins first prize in a draw. S5 Ep8

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale

programme.title: Shift Living in the Digital Age
programme.desc: Can I use blockchain technology? Will artificial intelligence take over my career? What exactly is "Machine Learning"? These are some of the questions „SHIFT – Living in the Digital Age“ tries to answer. The program focuses on a single topic – in depth and in detail. We talk to experts, present the key facts and explain complicated subjects in a simple manner. SHIFT – substantial, never superficial.

programme.title: The 77 Percent The Magazine for Africa's Youth
programme.desc: Should we be concerned about our water? This week The 77 Percent looks at water pollution around Africa, we test Nairobi's drinking and river water, and we meet a swimmer, an entrepreneur and environmentalist trying to change the fate of our Lake Volta in Ghana, Nairobi River and Rwizi River in Uganda. To top it all, 'My Hustle's Samson Adeleke, takes us fishing on the coast of Ghana.

programme.title: Shift Living in the Digital Age
programme.desc: Can I use blockchain technology? Will artificial intelligence take over my career? What exactly is "Machine Learning"? programme.title: The 77 Percent The Magazine for Africa's Youth
programme.desc: Should we be concerned about our water? programme.title: Storm Stories: The Next Chapter
programme.desc: Two friends in Key West, Florida use Facebook Live to broadcast their harrowing experience aboard their boat during Hurricane Irma; storm chasers capture rare footage of a deadly tornado in Mississippi on Easter Sunday, 2020.

programme.title: Storm Stories: The Next Chapter
programme.desc: During a tornado outbreak in Oklahoma, a young man races to save his cousin who has autism, trapped in a house just as a twister is about to slam into it; a former roadie for the Grateful Dead uses a garden hose to save his house from a wildfire.

programme.title: Storm Stories: The Next Chapter
programme.desc: A Dallas man who heads outside to get a pizza during halftime of a Cowboys-Eagles football game spots an EF-3 tornado barreling through the city; a trauma nurse jumps into action as a rare Christmastime twister devastates a small Mississippi town.

programme.title: Deadman's Curse

programme.title: Deadman's Curse
programme.desc: The recent glacier expedition leaves Kru rattled and rethinking his approach; clues left by an Indigenous voice from the past send the entire team north into the wild terrain of the Upper Pitt in search of Slumach's gold.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E8 The Many Faces of Charles Siringo Unable to apprehend the train-robbing Smith Brothers, Sheriff Doc Shores calls the Pinkerton Detective Agency for assistance. The agency sends Charles Siringo, an undercover specialist known for his unorthodox methods of capturing criminals.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S4 E1 The Jud Steele Story A posse pursues Jud Steele, a wanted gunslinger, and his partner. They join the wagon train to rest their horses. Steele dies trying to steal fresh horses. Hawks returns his belongings to the sheriff, who says Steele died five years ago.

programme.title: Christmas on the Range
programme.desc: Despite constant threats from her ambitious neighbor, Kendall Riley fights heroically to save the family ranch. In a surprising turn of events, Clint McCree, a veterinarian and her neighbor's son, arrives on the scene to deliver a calf from a cow having trouble giving birth. Gradually, a romance blossoms, until her neighbor's henchmen scatter Kendall's herd and she wonders if Clint's concern is genuine or if he is part of his family's effort to sabotage her land. Filled with action, adventure, and emotion, this modern-day Western provides an engaging tribute to small towns, big dreams and the power of love. Stars Erin Cahill (Saving Grace, Red Widow, Sleepy Hollow), Nicholas Gonzalez (The Good Doctor, Walker Texas Ranger), A Martinez (Longmire, The Cowboys, Days of our Lives), and Lindsay Wagner (The Bionic Woman, Grey's Anatomy).

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: In 1866, the Reno Brothers gang is ravaging Indiana. When a detective agency sends a man to infiltrate the gang by posing as an outlaw, he sets a trap to capture the gang during an early-morning train robbery.

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: When a card shark receives a letter from a distant and troubled son, he travels to rescue the boy and his mother. During a train ride, the gambler meets a friendly, prideful young card player and shares his wisdom.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E11 Quicksand In order to help a wagon load of traveling settlers in need of rescue and supplies, Cheyenne fights to show his courage against an Indian chief in a pit of swallowing sand. The first one to yell for help loses the fight.

programme.title: Christmas in Wolf Creek
programme.desc: It's Samantha and Austin to the rescue as they track a wayward reindeer in time to save the town's Christmas Eve play, but will this adventure bring them closer together, or create more tension than their new relationship can weather?

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E9 Spirits Rachel falls for a military division agent who has a drinking problem. When his issues start affecting her, Rachel reveals that she's had a problem with alcohol in the past. Meanwhile, with Teaspoon and other riders away, Noah heads a slim crew.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E25 Which Way'd They Go? The Jackman clan must sell their farm to pay back taxes. The Jackmans were not much at farming so they move to a nearby town and take jobs as peace officers. When bank robbers confront them, Lucas must step in and help them deal with the outlaws.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E26 Old Tony Old Tony, an irritable old recluse, has a reputation in North Fork as being a mean hermit. When Mark and his girlfriend, Lorrie, look for arrowheads on his land, they become trapped in quicksand. Tony shows his good-hearted nature and rescues them.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E3 Pinkerton Detectives Track a Killer After a bank robbery, two Pinkerton detectives join forces to track the notorious Missouri Kid. During a shootout, the Missouri Kid kills seasoned detective Charles Schumacher, leaving young George Dougherty to finish the job and avenge his death.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E8 The Many Faces of Charles Siringo Unable to apprehend the train-robbing Smith Brothers, Sheriff Doc Shores calls the Pinkerton Detective Agency for assistance. The agency sends Charles Siringo, an undercover specialist known for his unorthodox methods of capturing criminals.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S4 E1 The Jud Steele Story A posse pursues Jud Steele, a wanted gunslinger, and his partner. They join the wagon train to rest their horses. Steele dies trying to steal fresh horses. Hawks returns his belongings to the sheriff, who says Steele died five years ago.

programme.title: Christmas on the Range
programme.desc: Despite constant threats from her ambitious neighbor, Kendall Riley fights heroically to save the family ranch. In a surprising turn of events, Clint McCree, a veterinarian and her neighbor's son, arrives on the scene to deliver a calf from a cow having trouble giving birth. Gradually, a romance blossoms, until her neighbor's henchmen scatter Kendall's herd and she wonders if Clint's concern is genuine or if he is part of his family's effort to sabotage her land. Filled with action, adventure, and emotion, this modern-day Western provides an engaging tribute to small towns, big dreams and the power of love. Stars Erin Cahill (Saving Grace, Red Widow, Sleepy Hollow), Nicholas Gonzalez (The Good Doctor, Walker Texas Ranger), A Martinez (Longmire, The Cowboys, Days of our Lives), and Lindsay Wagner (The Bionic Woman, Grey's Anatomy).

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: In 1866, the Reno Brothers gang is ravaging Indiana. When a detective agency sends a man to infiltrate the gang by posing as an outlaw, he sets a trap to capture the gang during an early-morning train robbery.

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: When a card shark receives a letter from a distant and troubled son, he travels to rescue the boy and his mother. During a train ride, the gambler meets a friendly, prideful young card player and shares his wisdom.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E1 Go Big or Go Broker Tough jobs and shady business deals force the cowboys to work smarter, not harder. A local rancher asks the guys to remove an ornery bull from his property, but this one is as bullheaded as they come - and takes longer than expected. Tired of scrapping for day wages, the cowboys decide to put their hard-earned experience to use: instead of working cattle for others, they'll start brokering herds themselves. After sifting through his grandmother's old photos, Booger reconnects with his past, then looks to the future by passing on the cowboy way to four-year-old Matthew. While Bubba confides in Kaley that the cowboys are reevaluating their business, Cody gets bad news about his upcoming rodeo, which is even worse news for his bank account.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E2 Don't Mess with Texas The cowboys head to Texas! A simple wrangling job leads to the perfect cattle trading opportunity. The guys plot a course for Texas to capitalize on a buyer's market. Cody forgets his saddle on a routine roundup, and the only thing sorer than his backside is his ego when Booger and Bubba don't let him live down his mistake. After months of searching, Jaclyn and Booger finally find a piece of land perfect for settling down. But can they pull the trigger on the property before someone else swoops in? Bubba gets in hot water with Kaley when he tells Andrew, a long-term friend and ranch hand, that he can crash at their place - but without asking her first. Still licking his wounds from a double-cross, Cody weighs the pros and cons of holding his own rodeo. As their wives juggle life back home, the cowboys hit the road to broker their first big deal. They hope to find the crossbred cattle their buyer is looking for in the Lone Star State.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E17 The Quiet Fear Jake Striker buys Brice Hornsby's farm after moving to North Fork. Townspeople befriend Jake's pretty daughter, Abbey, who is deaf and cannot speak. Problems arise when a trail bum attacks her and blames the hired hand. Lucas must find the truth.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E18 Sporting Chance Englishman Jeremy Pennebroke arrives in North Fork and announces he has come to kill Lucas McCain with his custom-made rifle. He believes if he guns Lucas down, he will earn respect and a reputation. Ironically, Lucas later defends Pennebroke.

programme.title: Black Fox
programme.desc: A former slave and his white blood brother have moved their families from the Carolinas to Texas. When the Civil War begins, their settlement is left unprotected from hostile Indian tribes and the former slave may be the only hope for peace.

programme.title: Black Fox: The Price of Peace
programme.desc: A Texas woman falls in love with a Kiowa brave, and chooses to remain with him rather than return to her demanding and abusive husband. Driven by bitterness and rage, the husband soon forms a hunting party set on recapturing his bride, at any price.

programme.title: Legends of the Pony Express
programme.desc: Heroic Pony Express riders and station keepers face deadly terrain, hostile Native Americans, and dangerous outlaws to deliver vital mail across the untamed frontier. Their life-and-death adventures unite the country and become the stuff of legends.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S5 E12 Massacre at Gunsight Pass Cheyenne travels on a stagecoach to deliver prisoner Johnny Eldorado to Fort Bridger. When an arrogant Russian passenger shoots and kills a Shoshone brave on the way, they must hurry to a relay station to find safety.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S5 E13 The Greater Glory A woman who endures many hardships but maintains her strong faith in God impresses Cheyenne. With her husband wounded and unable to work, Cheyenne, and Billy the Kid, join forces to help her drive her herd of cattle 50 miles.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E1 Trail of Hate Three bank robbers come to the McCain Ranch and force Lucas into helping them rob the North Fork Bank. One robber stays behind to guard Mark while the other two take Lucas to town. They threaten to kill Mark, unless Lucas cooperates with the gunmen.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E2 Woman from Hog Ridge When Lucas and Mark catch two young men stealing a horse, Lucas is forced into a shootout. He captures one of the men, but Ma Boyle's son is killed in the gunfight. Soon after the killing, the Boyle clan comes to hang the person responsible.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E3 Seven A prison wagon carrying seven criminals stops in North Fork for supplies. The men escape, barricade themselves in the North Fork Saloon, and take saloon owner, Frank Sweeney, hostage. Lucas must act quickly to save Sweeney and the town from harm.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E4 The Pitchman A fast-talking con man and his teenage son stop at Lucas McCain's Ranch and try to talk their way into securing the mineral rights. However, the plan backfires when they discover the gold they thought was on the property is actually fool's gold.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E1 Go Big or Go Broker Tough jobs and shady business deals force the cowboys to work smarter, not harder. A local rancher asks the guys to remove an ornery bull from his property, but this one is as bullheaded as they come - and takes longer than expected. Tired of scrapping for day wages, the cowboys decide to put their hard-earned experience to use: instead of working cattle for others, they'll start brokering herds themselves. After sifting through his grandmother's old photos, Booger reconnects with his past, then looks to the future by passing on the cowboy way to four-year-old Matthew. While Bubba confides in Kaley that the cowboys are reevaluating their business, Cody gets bad news about his upcoming rodeo, which is even worse news for his bank account.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E2 Don't Mess with Texas The cowboys head to Texas! A simple wrangling job leads to the perfect cattle trading opportunity. The guys plot a course for Texas to capitalize on a buyer's market. Cody forgets his saddle on a routine roundup, and the only thing sorer than his backside is his ego when Booger and Bubba don't let him live down his mistake. After months of searching, Jaclyn and Booger finally find a piece of land perfect for settling down. But can they pull the trigger on the property before someone else swoops in? Bubba gets in hot water with Kaley when he tells Andrew, a long-term friend and ranch hand, that he can crash at their place - but without asking her first. Still licking his wounds from a double-cross, Cody weighs the pros and cons of holding his own rodeo. As their wives juggle life back home, the cowboys hit the road to broker their first big deal. They hope to find the crossbred cattle their buyer is looking for in the Lone Star State.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E17 The Quiet Fear Jake Striker buys Brice Hornsby's farm after moving to North Fork. Townspeople befriend Jake's pretty daughter, Abbey, who is deaf and cannot speak. Problems arise when a trail bum attacks her and blames the hired hand. Lucas must find the truth.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E18 Sporting Chance Englishman Jeremy Pennebroke arrives in North Fork and announces he has come to kill Lucas McCain with his custom-made rifle. He believes if he guns Lucas down, he will earn respect and a reputation. Ironically, Lucas later defends Pennebroke.

programme.title: Black Fox
programme.desc: A former slave and his white blood brother have moved their families from the Carolinas to Texas. When the Civil War begins, their settlement is left unprotected from hostile Indian tribes and the former slave may be the only hope for peace.

programme.title: Black Fox: The Price of Peace
programme.desc: A Texas woman falls in love with a Kiowa brave, and chooses to remain with him rather than return to her demanding and abusive husband. Driven by bitterness and rage, the husband soon forms a hunting party set on recapturing his bride, at any price.

programme.title: Legends of the Pony Express
programme.desc: Heroic Pony Express riders and station keepers face deadly terrain, hostile Native Americans, and dangerous outlaws to deliver vital mail across the untamed frontier. Their life-and-death adventures unite the country and become the stuff of legends.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S5 E12 Massacre at Gunsight Pass Cheyenne travels on a stagecoach to deliver prisoner Johnny Eldorado to Fort Bridger. When an arrogant Russian passenger shoots and kills a Shoshone brave on the way, they must hurry to a relay station to find safety.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S5 E13 The Greater Glory A woman who endures many hardships but maintains her strong faith in God impresses Cheyenne. With her husband wounded and unable to work, Cheyenne, and Billy the Kid, join forces to help her drive her herd of cattle 50 miles.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E1 Trail of Hate Three bank robbers come to the McCain Ranch and force Lucas into helping them rob the North Fork Bank. One robber stays behind to guard Mark while the other two take Lucas to town. They threaten to kill Mark, unless Lucas cooperates with the gunmen.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E2 Woman from Hog Ridge When Lucas and Mark catch two young men stealing a horse, Lucas is forced into a shootout. He captures one of the men, but Ma Boyle's son is killed in the gunfight. Soon after the killing, the Boyle clan comes to hang the person responsible.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E3 Seven A prison wagon carrying seven criminals stops in North Fork for supplies. The men escape, barricade themselves in the North Fork Saloon, and take saloon owner, Frank Sweeney, hostage. Lucas must act quickly to save Sweeney and the town from harm.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E4 The Pitchman A fast-talking con man and his teenage son stop at Lucas McCain's Ranch and try to talk their way into securing the mineral rights. However, the plan backfires when they discover the gold they thought was on the property is actually fool's gold.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: The cowboys are deep in the heart of Texas! In this episode of The Cowboy Way, the guys try to cash in on a cattle bounty roundup: hard cash for each cow they catch. But this money ain't easy thanks to a sprawling 500-acre ranch covered in mesquite brush with razor-sharp thorns. Just when the cowboys think they've found a promising Texas cattle connection, Booger makes a big mistake that could jeopardize their first meeting with a hard-nosed rancher. Back in Alabama, Bubba and Kaley's house guest is beginning to overstay his welcome. As they try to teach Andrew the Thompson house rules, he commits the biggest cowboy sin of all - messing with Bubba's grill! Booger, Jaclyn, and Matthew care for a new-born calf. Misty has a special surprise for Cody. An offer to travel back to Texas for another cattle drive doesn't thrill the cowboys, but they begin to consider the networking potential and how it might make their cattle-trading dreams come true.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E4 Cash Cows First, the cowboys need to track down one of Bubba's most troublesome heifers before she can bust through his fence again. After briefly tending to business and family in Alabama, the guys head back to the Lone Star State to try and expand their network of contacts. Bubba, Cody, and Booger help their new friend Cash with a big Texas cattle drive in the hopes of both leading the herd to greener pastures and finding the big cattle deal they came west for. On the range they forge deeper bonds with their Texas counterparts, swapping cowboy stories around the campfire. But things take a turn for the worse when the herd overheats, and the creek they're all counting on has run dry as a bone. Back home, Jaclyn and Matthew are learning to love life on the ranch. Houseguest Andrew's disgusting habits have Kaley seeing red. And just as Misty gets back in the barrel-racing saddle, she starts to butt heads with her high-strung mare.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E19 A Young Man's Fancy A pretty young girl named Sally Walker arrives on stagecoach in North Fork to visit her aunt Milly. When Mark sees her beauty, he falls in love with Sally instantly. However, she has her eyes on a boy from her past, Bruce Henry, who owns a ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E20 The Man from Salinas Lucas is acting deputy while Marshal Micah Torrance is away on business. When the North Fork Bank is robbed, Lucas shoots and critically wounds Rudy Gray. Problems arise when a man posing as Gray's brother arrives in town.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E7 Molly's Choice A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Snakeroot Cure When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E13 Stagecoach Mary While working as a groundskeeper at a convent in Ohio, former slave Mary Fields forms a deep friendship with the superior, Mother Amadeus Dunne. When Mother Amadeus falls ill after traveling to Montana to open a girls' school, Mary rushes to her rescue and nurses her back to health. Mary soon discovers that the Western Frontier satisfies her free-spirited nature, and she decides to stay in Montana for good. She secures a contract to deliver mail by stagecoach for the U.S. Postal Service, becoming the first African American woman to carry mail. With a fearless attitude and multiple firearms, she protects the mail from would-be bandits and is soon known far and wide. Some years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson meets Sister Amadeus and gets the true story of Stagecoach Mary.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E14 Annie Oakley: Rise of a Shooting Star After her father's death, nine-year-old Annie Oakley first picks up a rifle and begins shooting small game in order to feed her siblings and support her widowed mother. By her teenage years, Annie is so good at hunting that she begins supplying meat to a local grocery store, earning enough money to pay off her mother's mortgage. When famed sharpshooter Frank Butler comes to town for an exhibition, Annie accepts his challenge to participate in a shooting match. Not only does she win the match, but she wins Butler's heart as well. They are soon married, but they struggle to make it as a team on stage. A better shooter, Annie must become the main attraction for them to succeed. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson, tracks down Annie's husband to learn more about the rise of this shooting star.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E1 John Colter: King of the Mountain Men As a member of Lewis and Clark's Corps of Discovery, John Colter travels from the Missouri River all the way to the Pacific Ocean, but he decides not to return to the civilized East when the expedition ends. Entranced by the beauty and adventure of the wild frontier, he becomes one of America's first mountain men. As a hunter, trapper and explorer in his own right, he's the first American to see the Grand Tetons and the epic Yellowstone Valley. While his epic explorations make him famous, it's a harrowing ordeal with Blackfeet warriors that makes him a legend. After boldly venturing into territory controlled by the Blackfeet tribe, Colter is captured, stripped naked, and forced to run for his life as warriors give chase in what will come to be known as Colter's Run.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E10 Last Hand Standing In the season finale of Ultimate Cowboy Showdown, the top three competitors cowboy up for a chance to win it all. In the last elimination challenge, the cowboys must work as a team to separate the prized cattle from two hundred other cows and drive the herd to a semi-truck, where they will load them up for the winner to take home. A big job for three cowboys, frustrations get the best of them. One contestant covers the rougher country to stand out to the judges. Another cowboy suggests breaking the rules to finish the job, but their teammate steps up and takes the lead to get the job done right. Trace sits down with each cowboy to talk about what winning would mean to them before announcing the Ultimate Cowboy Showdown winner.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E9 Bad Company Jimmy accidentally kills an innocent woman during a gunfight. Full of guilt, he goes to a lawless town, thinking that is where he should reside. The riders go after him to convince him that he doesn't belong there.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E1 Winchester Quarantine Cheyenne meets a beautiful, feisty woman and helps her drive her herd of cattle to safety from a fever outbreak during a Texas quarantine. Despite her business struggles, he also finds himself falling in love with her.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E2 Trouble Street When Cheyenne rides into a town, the deputy quickly arrests him for no apparent reason. He discovers that the corrupt deputy arrests others passing through town and forces them to work at a local mine.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E5 Strange Town Prisoner Bletch Droshek escapes from Marshal Micah Torrance, and leaves him beaten on a barbed-wire fence. Torrance stumbles to the McCain Ranch and deputizes Lucas to apprehend Droshek at a mining camp run by his brother.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E6 Baranca A Mexican bandit named Baranca and his gang ride into North Fork looking for Bro Hadley, who murdered a Mexican farmer and burned down his home. Baranca finds Hadley and intends to get justice by executing him. However, Lucas intervenes just in time.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E7 The Martinet Cavalry Captain Josiah Perry, a disciplined military man, learns his son, Lon, died in a North Fork gunfight with Lucas. Perry is bent on making Lucas pay for Lon's death. Perry's other son, Ben, tries to keep his dad from facing the same fate.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E8 Miss Milly A young, naïve woman who doesn't have any business experience comes to North Fork and purchases the general store from Hattie Denton. A newcomer and his partner con her by posing as collection agents, putting the town's citizens in danger.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way

programme.desc: S3 E5 Strange Town Prisoner Bletch Droshek escapes from Marshal Micah Torrance, and leaves him beaten on a barbed-wire fence. Torrance stumbles to the McCain Ranch and deputizes Lucas to apprehend Droshek at a mining camp run by his brother.

programme.desc: S3 E6 Baranca A Mexican bandit named Baranca and his gang ride into North Fork looking for Bro Hadley, who murdered a Mexican farmer and burned down his home. Baranca finds Hadley and intends to get justice by executing him. However, Lucas intervenes just in time.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E7 The Martinet Cavalry Captain Josiah Perry, a disciplined military man, learns his son, Lon, died in a North Fork gunfight with Lucas. Perry is bent on making Lucas pay for Lon's death. Perry's other son, Ben, tries to keep his dad from facing the same fate.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E8 Miss Milly A young, naïve woman who doesn't have any business experience comes to North Fork and purchases the general store from Hattie Denton. A newcomer and his partner con her by posing as collection agents, putting the town's citizens in danger.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E5 The Fall of Booger Bubba, Booger and Cody take an important step toward becoming big-time cattle brokers! The guys are roping and doctoring yearlings on the Texas range. But when Booger's most reliable horse Studly trips, smashing both horse and rider to the ground, Booger must rush out to find a vet and tend to his injured horse. Just as the cowboys are about to leave Texas, a local rancher makes them an offer they can't refuse. Will the guys gamble on a cattle deal, taking on a herd before they have a buyer lined up? Back home in Alabama, Kaley's patience reaches a breaking point as houseguest Andrew tracks in mud and expects a free lunch. To top it off, he then asks if his whole family can crash there while he searches for a permanent residence. Misty finds some extra help with her troublesome barrel-racing horse. Booger and Matthew are on the hunt for the perfect one-year anniversary gift for Jaclyn. But Booger may have a special surprise up his sleeve.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E6 Storm's A-Brewin' A storm is coming to The Cowboy Way! Cody visits his cousin Bo to secure steer for his upcoming rodeo, leaving Booger and Bubba to ear-tag some yearlings by themselves. Bubba takes the opportunity to put houseguest Andrew to work. Misty continues to try and shake off her barrel-racing rust, and comes to a serious crossroads with her misbehaving mare. Jaclyn presses Booger to put a timeline on finding them a permanent home. Bubba sets out on a solo trip back to Texas to check out a lead on a big herd of Tigerstripe cattle. But just when he's about to cross the state line, a devastating category 4 hurricane barrels down on Alabama. All the cowboys' best-laid plans come to a screeching halt. Bubba must decide whether to turn around and head home, or push through for the big deal. Finding themselves directly in the path of the hurricane, everyone scrambles to prepare their ranches for the worst. Can the cowboys and their families safely ride out the storm?

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E21 Two Ounces of Tin A gunman named Tip Corey, whose father was allegedly murdered in North Fork, rides into town and threatens to kill Marshal Micah Torrance. Corey gives Micah an ultimatum: take his badge off or he will end his life.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E22 Deadly Image A local rancher, who claims to be an eyewitness, accuses Lucas of murder. Townspeople are shocked until Earl Bantry, who looks like Lucas' twin, arrives in North Fork. Bantry, a ruthless criminal, threatens Mark and goes on a rampage against Lucas.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Prizefighter When Jim Bridger's second-in-command begins enforcing camp discipline with brutal violence, one trapper pushes back, and a showdown seems inevitable. Can Bridger intervene before the situation turns from mutual hostility into cold-blooded murder?

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E10 A Shard of Glass Haunted by the memory of leaving a man to die, mountain man Jim Bridger is determined not to repeat the mistake. When his trapping party runs out of water while crossing a barren desert, Bridger struggles desperately to keep his companions alive.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E15 Charles M. Russell: The Cowboy Artist Charlie Russell is an aimless cowhand who loves the freedom of the cowboy way of life, and he is a self-taught artist who enjoys capturing the scenes of his rugged work on the range. Too embarrassed to ask people to pay for his paintings, he gives most of them away to friends or trades them for drinks at the saloon. But that changes quickly after he falls in love. Charlie's new bride Nancy gives him the encouragement he needs to stop cowboying in order to focus on his artwork. Under her watchful eye, he sobers up, stops cowboying, and improves his mastery of painting. Nancy is so proud of Charlie's talent that she doesn't hesitate to ask top dollar for his paintings. Years later, when legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson tries to do a piece on Charlie, he quickly realizes that he must first deal with the woman behind the famous cowboy artist Charles M. Russell.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E4 The Legend of Nat Love When Black cowboy Nat Love overnights in Deadwood during a cattle drive, he decides to enter a Fourth of July cowboy competition. Confident in his roping, riding, and shooting skills, he is eager to test his mettle against the best cowboys around.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E2 Jim Bridger: Forged on the Frontier With dreams of fortune and adventure, an 18-year-old Jim Bridger joins William Ashley's expedition to trap beaver along the Missouri River. But a grim ordeal soon forces Bridger to weigh his morals against the harsh reality of survival in the wild. A vicious grizzly bear attack leaves fellow trapper and hunter Hugh Glass on the verge of death and completely dependent upon Bridger's care. As a hostile band of Arikara warriors begins to close in, Bridger must choose between staying with the dying man and risking certain death, or leaving his injured comrade alone in the woods and fleeing to safety. In what becomes a legendary tale of the wild frontier, Bridger wrestles to choose between right and wrong, knowing the harsh retribution that will follow if he makes the wrong choice.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S3 E1 The Ultimate Cowboy: Conquering the West Fourteen cowboys take on the unpredictable Wyoming climate to win a herd of cattle. Host Trace Adkins sends the first contestant home.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E11 The Play's the Thing Cody joins a troupe of traveling actors, unaware that the group's members are Confederates who are plotting to assassinate U.S. General Fremont. When the riders discover the truth, they ride to Fort Laramie to save Fremont from getting murdered.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E3 Cross Purpose Cheyenne finds himself involved in a dispute regarding dead war hero, Colonel Charles DeVier. Many believe the Comanches killed him, but the discovery of the hero's body and the disappearance of Captain Robert Holman leads Cheyenne to the truth.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E4 The Young Fugitives Cheyenne visits old friend Frank Collins who is in a wheelchair. He sees that townspeople are taunting Frank's loner son, Gilby. Gilby enters a circus shooting contest in town. Tragedy ensues when Gilby shoots a man. Cheyenne must stop a lynch mob.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E9 Dead Cold Cash Sara Caruthers, the deceased widow of a bandit Lucas shot when he was a deputy marshal, has an unusal will to get revenge against McCain. It stipulates that $100,000 be divided among North Fork residents if Lucas dies within seven days of her death.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Schoolmaster Mr. Griswald is the new North Fork schoolmaster. As a harsh disciplinarian, he quickly clashes with Mark and his friend one too many times. When the boys decide to play hooky from school, they find big trouble when they get trapped in an old mine.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E11 The Promoter Con man Jack Scully comes to North Fork with his friend, Reuben Miles, a simple-minded young man who is fast with a gun. Scully uses the young gun to win money by coaxing people into gunfights. Lucas becomes the next target.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E12 The Illustrator Hannah Shaw waits excitedly for New York artist Jeremiah Crowley to come to North Fork to paint her portrait. When he finally arrives, Hannah discovers he is a drunkard and is in trouble with the law. Lucas, as acting marshal, tries to help him out.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E5 The Fall of Booger Bubba, Booger and Cody take an important step toward becoming big-time cattle brokers! The guys are roping and doctoring yearlings on the Texas range. But when Booger's most reliable horse Studly trips, smashing both horse and rider to the ground, Booger must rush out to find a vet and tend to his injured horse. Just as the cowboys are about to leave Texas, a local rancher makes them an offer they can't refuse. Will the guys gamble on a cattle deal, taking on a herd before they have a buyer lined up? Back home in Alabama, Kaley's patience reaches a breaking point as houseguest Andrew tracks in mud and expects a free lunch. To top it off, he then asks if his whole family can crash there while he searches for a permanent residence. Misty finds some extra help with her troublesome barrel-racing horse. Booger and Matthew are on the hunt for the perfect one-year anniversary gift for Jaclyn. But Booger may have a special surprise up his sleeve.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E6 Storm's A-Brewin' A storm is coming to The Cowboy Way! Cody visits his cousin Bo to secure steer for his upcoming rodeo, leaving Booger and Bubba to ear-tag some yearlings by themselves. Bubba takes the opportunity to put houseguest Andrew to work. Misty continues to try and shake off her barrel-racing rust, and comes to a serious crossroads with her misbehaving mare. Jaclyn presses Booger to put a timeline on finding them a permanent home. Bubba sets out on a solo trip back to Texas to check out a lead on a big herd of Tigerstripe cattle. But just when he's about to cross the state line, a devastating category 4 hurricane barrels down on Alabama. All the cowboys' best-laid plans come to a screeching halt. Bubba must decide whether to turn around and head home, or push through for the big deal. Finding themselves directly in the path of the hurricane, everyone scrambles to prepare their ranches for the worst. Can the cowboys and their families safely ride out the storm?

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E21 Two Ounces of Tin A gunman named Tip Corey, whose father was allegedly murdered in North Fork, rides into town and threatens to kill Marshal Micah Torrance. Corey gives Micah an ultimatum: take his badge off or he will end his life.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E22 Deadly Image A local rancher, who claims to be an eyewitness, accuses Lucas of murder. Townspeople are shocked until Earl Bantry, who looks like Lucas' twin, arrives in North Fork. Bantry, a ruthless criminal, threatens Mark and goes on a rampage against Lucas.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Prizefighter When Jim Bridger's second-in-command begins enforcing camp discipline with brutal violence, one trapper pushes back, and a showdown seems inevitable. Can Bridger intervene before the situation turns from mutual hostility into cold-blooded murder?

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E10 A Shard of Glass Haunted by the memory of leaving a man to die, mountain man Jim Bridger is determined not to repeat the mistake. When his trapping party runs out of water while crossing a barren desert, Bridger struggles desperately to keep his companions alive.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E15 Charles M. Russell: The Cowboy Artist Charlie Russell is an aimless cowhand who loves the freedom of the cowboy way of life, and he is a self-taught artist who enjoys capturing the scenes of his rugged work on the range. Too embarrassed to ask people to pay for his paintings, he gives most of them away to friends or trades them for drinks at the saloon. But that changes quickly after he falls in love. Charlie's new bride Nancy gives him the encouragement he needs to stop cowboying in order to focus on his artwork. Under her watchful eye, he sobers up, stops cowboying, and improves his mastery of painting. Nancy is so proud of Charlie's talent that she doesn't hesitate to ask top dollar for his paintings. Years later, when legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson tries to do a piece on Charlie, he quickly realizes that he must first deal with the woman behind the famous cowboy artist Charles M. Russell.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E4 The Legend of Nat Love When Black cowboy Nat Love overnights in Deadwood during a cattle drive, he decides to enter a Fourth of July cowboy competition. Confident in his roping, riding, and shooting skills, he is eager to test his mettle against the best cowboys around.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E2 Jim Bridger: Forged on the Frontier With dreams of fortune and adventure, an 18-year-old Jim Bridger joins William Ashley's expedition to trap beaver along the Missouri River. But a grim ordeal soon forces Bridger to weigh his morals against the harsh reality of survival in the wild. A vicious grizzly bear attack leaves fellow trapper and hunter Hugh Glass on the verge of death and completely dependent upon Bridger's care. As a hostile band of Arikara warriors begins to close in, Bridger must choose between staying with the dying man and risking certain death, or leaving his injured comrade alone in the woods and fleeing to safety. In what becomes a legendary tale of the wild frontier, Bridger wrestles to choose between right and wrong, knowing the harsh retribution that will follow if he makes the wrong choice.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S3 E1 The Ultimate Cowboy: Conquering the West Fourteen cowboys take on the unpredictable Wyoming climate to win a herd of cattle. Host Trace Adkins sends the first contestant home.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E11 The Play's the Thing Cody joins a troupe of traveling actors, unaware that the group's members are Confederates who are plotting to assassinate U.S. General Fremont. When the riders discover the truth, they ride to Fort Laramie to save Fremont from getting murdered.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E3 Cross Purpose Cheyenne finds himself involved in a dispute regarding dead war hero, Colonel Charles DeVier. Many believe the Comanches killed him, but the discovery of the hero's body and the disappearance of Captain Robert Holman leads Cheyenne to the truth.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E4 The Young Fugitives Cheyenne visits old friend Frank Collins who is in a wheelchair. He sees that townspeople are taunting Frank's loner son, Gilby. Gilby enters a circus shooting contest in town. Tragedy ensues when Gilby shoots a man. Cheyenne must stop a lynch mob.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E9 Dead Cold Cash Sara Caruthers, the deceased widow of a bandit Lucas shot when he was a deputy marshal, has an unusal will to get revenge against McCain. It stipulates that $100,000 be divided among North Fork residents if Lucas dies within seven days of her death.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Schoolmaster Mr. Griswald is the new North Fork schoolmaster. As a harsh disciplinarian, he quickly clashes with Mark and his friend one too many times. When the boys decide to play hooky from school, they find big trouble when they get trapped in an old mine.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E11 The Promoter Con man Jack Scully comes to North Fork with his friend, Reuben Miles, a simple-minded young man who is fast with a gun. Scully uses the young gun to win money by coaxing people into gunfights. Lucas becomes the next target.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E12 The Illustrator Hannah Shaw waits excitedly for New York artist Jeremiah Crowley to come to North Fork to paint her portrait. When he finally arrives, Hannah discovers he is a drunkard and is in trouble with the law. Lucas, as acting marshal, tries to help him out.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E7 Horsing Around Cody's rodeo is fast approaching and time is running out, so the cowboys head out to scout talent for the team-roping event. Misty's new barrel-racing horse has taken her training to a whole new level. So when Booger starts teasing her, she challenges him to a one-on-one race: cowboy vs barrel racer! Misty also comes up with a potential rodeo venue, so Cody heads out to Bay Minette, AL to lock down a site. Bubba and Kaley prepare for houseguest Andrew's family to arrive. Will Andrew finally find his own place, and get out of Kaley's hair? Meanwhile, the guys' reputation as cattle brokers starts to flourish. Booger gets a lead on a healthy herd of cattle in Texas, and the guys consider if they should go all-in and buy the entire herd. Booger heads back to the Lone Star State and strikes a deal that seems to be a win-win. But just as the guys get the ball rolling with another big deal, a phone call from their buyer puts everything in jeopardy.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E8 Kiddie Corral The cowboys step a little outside of their comfort zones. Looking to offload their new herd, the guys head down to the local stockyard to hone their bartering skills. Cody bounces a crazy rodeo idea off the boys - then uses them guinea pigs. Bubba plans a short getaway with Kaley, but there's a big catch: Booger's been tapped as the babysitter, with Jaclyn lending a helping hand. Kaley wonders if Booger is up to the challenge. His first attempts to feed and dress little Andie suggest he most certainly is not! While Bubba and Kaley aren't sure they'll return home to find everything in one piece, they do get some great news from houseguest Andrew. Cody is desperate to find the final missing piece for his rodeo: an announcer. While Booger adamant that he's the perfect man for the job, Cody has to resort to using reverse psychology on his old friend to avoid disaster.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E23 The Debt While Marshal Micah Torrance is transporting a prisoner to his execution, he meets Lucas and Mark on the trail. When Mark reocognizes the convict is the same man who saved his life three years earlier, he disobeys his father and helps him escape.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E24 Tinhorn Mark and Milly are shocked that Lucas has taken up gambling. However, they don't know that a good friend is in danger of losing his farm to a professional gambler and has asked Lucas to help. Lucas goes undercover to get to the bottom of things.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E1 They Killed Me Frontiersman Jim Bridger spins an incredible tale to a group of settlers, claiming he was once killed by Blackfeet warriors yet somehow lived to tell the tale. They think he's joking, but Bridger soon proves that he really did rise from the dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E4 Brothers in Arms When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E5 The Masterson Brothers Part 1 After Marshal Ed Masterson is shot while breaking up a barroom brawl, he hastily bans all firearms in Dodge City. Ed's swift proclamation is met with disdain by most townsfolk, including his own brothers, and places an even larger target on his back.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E6 The Masterson Brothers Part 2 After Marshal Ed Masterson is gunned down in Dodge City, his youngest brother, James, decides to follow in his footsteps and become a lawman. But when James' life is threatened, middle brother Bat Masterson races back from Arizona to protect his kin.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E8 Jedediah Smith: Scholar and Survivor A young Jedediah Smith joins William Ashley's expedition and helps establish the fur trade along the Missouri River, but it's not hunting or trapping he longs for...it's adventure. Inspired by Lewis and Clark, he wants to explore the vast, uncharted American frontier. Trekking through unknown and unforgiving terrain, Smith's iron will and unwavering courage under fire help him survive a vicious grizzly bear attack, hostile Native Americans, and life-or-death periods of starvation, dehydration, and exhaustion. During his incredible journeys, he becomes the first non-Native American to cross the Mojave Desert into California, the first to navigate through the perilous Sierra Nevada Mountains, and the first to traverse the Great Basin Desert. He ultimately sees more of the American West than any other adventurer, including Lewis and Clark, and opens the frontier in a way that no other mountain man can claim.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S3 E2 Leading the Pack The cowboys compete in the first immunity challenge and take on a treacherous elimination challenge inspired by The Man from Snowy River.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E12 Judgement Day Still feeling the effects of Hezekiah Horn's death, Cody seeks guidance from a self-proclaimed preacher named Gideon Poole. Cody discovers that Poole is a bounty hunter and that he is after Teaspoon for dropped charges from 16 years ago.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E5 Day's Pay Cheyenne arrives in a town held hostage by a gang of bandits. Outlaw Luis Boladas kills young, inexperienced Sheriff Billy Fipps. The town wants to lynch Boladas, but Cheyenne discovers he once saved him from hanging.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E6 Retaliation Sheriff Cheyenne Bodie is out of town visiting widow Cora Ainslie and her son Bart. A group of men robs the bank and blows up a train trestle while he is away. Cheyenne discovers that banker Thackery Smith rules the town, and many are not happy.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E13 The Silent Knife Mark, a young mute boy, arrives in North Fork. When townspeople treat Mark badly because he cannot speak, Lucas and his son, Mark, befriend him. Desperate for cash, the boy steals $500 from a stagecoach line. Lucas convinces him to return the money.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E14 Miss Bertie Bertie Hoakam, a lively little old lady, comes to North Fork. She tells Lucas and Micah of her plan to capture a ruthless bandit for the reward money to support herself. To everyone's surprise, she succeeds with her plan.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E15 Six Years and a Day Mrs. Marston is in dire need of a doctor after problems arise as she is giving birth. Mark and Lucas try to help but they need Doc Burrage, who is out of town. More problems come when two men arrive at the McCain Ranch intent on killing the doctor.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E16 Flowers by the Door Lucas is helping Cora Seevers mend a broken fence when Micah rides up to tell them about a murder nearby. The only clue at the scene is a pack of flower seeds. Lucas discovers that a sly book salesman offering free seeds to his victims is to blame.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E7 Horsing Around Cody's rodeo is fast approaching and time is running out, so the cowboys head out to scout talent for the team-roping event. Misty's new barrel-racing horse has taken her training to a whole new level. So when Booger starts teasing her, she challenges him to a one-on-one race: cowboy vs barrel racer! programme.desc: Up to the minute news updates, in-depth analysis, exclusive interviews and a fresh perspective on the day's top stories and key developments in breaking news, politics and current events.

programme.title: The Todd Starnes Show
programme.desc: Todd Starnes delivers breaking news and commentary covering politics, faith, and culture.

programme.title: Ed Henry The Briefing
programme.desc: Catch the latest headline and in-depth analysis on The Briefing, your go-to news show for a comprehensive afternoon update, with a dynamic blend of breaking news, politics, and business.

programme.title: The Leventhal Report
programme.desc: Rick Leventhal delivers comprehensive analysis and exclusive interviews on current affairs and significant events from home and abroad.

programme.title: David Harris Jr. The Pulse
programme.desc: David Harris Jr. delivers hard hitting analysis and opinion of latest news and events.

programme.title: America’s Mayor Live
programme.desc: Former NY Mayor Rudy Giuliani gives insight on leadership, courage, and the most pressing issues of our time.

programme.title: The Freedom File: Judge Napolitano
programme.desc: Judge Napolitano provides commentary on current events, drawing on his expertise in constitutional law to protect individual freedoms in his legal and political news coverage.

programme.title: Rob Carson’s What in the World?
programme.desc: Rob Carson dissects politics, cultural phenomena, and absurdity confronting us every day in America with humor and satire.

programme.title: Melania Trump: A Very Beautiful First Lady
programme.desc: An intimate look at Melania Trump's journey, from her childhood spent in a small Slovenian town to the White House. Learn how she first met \.

programme.title: Ed Henry The Briefing

programme.title: David Harris Jr. The Pulse

programme.title: Titanic Arrogance
programme.desc: 100 years ago, the Titanic was launched. See the revealing litany of human errors, from the building process to the tragic events that led her to be rammed into the iceberg that sank her.

programme.title: 1968: The Year Everything Fell Apart
programme.desc: 1968 started out with renewed hope for Americans, but quickly turned into a roller coaster year of ups and downs with riots, social divisiveness, and assassinations.

programme.title: 1969: A Summer Like No Other
programme.desc: Historian Craig Shirley narrates the amazing and momentous 1969 with Neil Armstrong walking on the moon to the many tumultuous events like Sen. Ted Kennedy's Chappaquiddick tragedy, the Charles Manson murders, the Vietnam War, and Woodstock.

programme.title: Bad Decisions: The Joe Biden Story
programme.desc: Joe Biden spent almost a half century at the very top of Washington Politics. An experienced insider, he also became known for some of the worst decisions ever made.

programme.title: Ronald Reagan: His Winning Wit
programme.desc: Reagan was the great communicator. He used humor to establish a bond with his audience and endear himself to his fellow Americans. See some of his greatest moments.

programme.title: Wendy Bell Common Sense
programme.desc: Veteran broadcaster Wendy Bell takes a deep dive into tough issues with guests from across the country.

programme.title: Rob Carson’s What in the World?

programme.title: First Edition
programme.desc: Start your day with a thorough overview of the latest news, insightful commentary, and expert analysis.

programme.desc: Liberty-loving host Chris Salcedo tackles all things politics from a constitutional conservative point of view.
